events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied.
The customer has reported dissatisfaction and requested a refund. The case will be categorized under Refund for further processing.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle this case to assist the customer efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund. Could you please provide your order number to proceed?
To process your refund request swiftly, please send us the order ID and any relevant details about the product.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item was fine but not what I expected, so Iâ€™d like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the product back using the provided return label.
Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the quick action and will send the product back as instructed.
We have received the returned product and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see it reflected in your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now, but please feel free to reach out if you need further help in the future.
